post.body: You don't sound so good bro...
I sure did - good luck on your new project!
Company limousine, client perk machine mainly.
That is beyond poopy, bud
PUN intended with GrabIt
I'm going to GrabIt today and give it a whirl I think
So is p90x kicking your ass...?
Amazing photo Kalin: http://bit.ly/Elpv
Yeah I got it working, but it's still some bull shit that they cripple their own software. OSX for the win.
Thanks for the hulu recommendation - watching Arrested Development on my external monitor now :)
Big ditto on those. Mail and NewsFire especially.
Is that a good show? I almost bought season 1 at Target today but I have never seen an episode.
It'd be interesting to know how new followers find you. Hello all! Be forewarned, I use profanity. If you don't like it, tough shit. <3 you!
Oh BTW, FedEx and the USPS delivered their asses off today, despite bad weather. Some even drove personal rigs to do it too. Yep, you SUCK.
UPS. What a joke of a company. It's been a long time since I've been fucked around so much. I know why they're brown now...because it's SHIT
Possibly acquiring a limousine at 3:30PM
Windows is such a piece of shit. Vista is the biggest mistake from now until forever. No RDC on Vista Home Premium? WTF DOES PREMIUM MEAN?!
Drinking Gilligan's Island's and enjoying my theater with my wife - great Saturday night!
The only thing more annoying than Dark Knight/Bluray commercials is @ijustine posting her video about it nonstop on MySpace.
Finally got XM working on my Squeezebox Duet - that was a long time coming.
